body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Scott's Car Dealership. My name is Stephen Scott. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Laura Price.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Laura. Could you provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, two three four, eight nine one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you also confirm your address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. It's four three two Elm Street, Apt two zero zero, Cityville.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information, Laura. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Not at the moment, thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome. Thank you for reaching out to us, Laura. Have a wonderful day!
